articles.content:
Former President of Indonesia Sends Floral Basket and Congratulatory Card to DPRK Embassy 
   Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Megawati Soekarnoputri, former president and chairwoman of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle, sent a floral basket and congratulatory card to the DPRK embassy in Jakarta on Feb. 15 on the occasion of the birthday of Kim Jong Il.
